scripts.js: browserify -t hyperxify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] js/app.js > static/app.js && uglifyjs static/app.js --compress --mangle --output static/app.js
scripts.js-watch: watchify -t hyperxify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o static/app.js js/app.js
scripts.css: postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-url -u postcss-cssnext -u cssnano -d static css/app.css
scripts.css-watch: postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-url -u postcss-cssnext -d static css/app.css -w
scripts.watch: npm run js-watch & npm run css-watch & nodemon -e js,html --ignore ./compiled/ -r dotenv/config server.js
scripts.build: npm run js && npm run css
